item.title: Utilizing Github Actions to Serve a tool via Web
item.description: TL;DR: I employed GitHub Actions to execute a Go utility, essentially utilizing GitHub Actions as a server to serve my Go tool via a Web interface. Just for fun, I wanted to serve one of my Go tools gh-archive through a web interface. After some thought, I decided to make use of (or exploit) GitHub Actions. Strategy: Gather user input through an HTML form (hosted via GitHub pages). Trigger a dispatch event to create a workflow in GitHub with a unique name.
